content.raw:
I've observer a couple crashes of gzclient while testing the multicamera_noisy_test.world. I open an Images viewer of the 6 cameras (~/multicamera_6/link/cam6/images) and move and rotate boxes. Occasionally gzclient crashes. I got the following backtrace, using the 1.7.0 deb version.
~~~
Program received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault.
[Switching to Thread 0x7fffdbfff700 (LWP 21145)]
0x00000000000000e1 in ?? ()
(gdb) bt
#0  0x00000000000000e1 in ?? ()
#1  0x00007ffff78fdd75 in gazebo::transport::Node::ProcessIncoming() ()
   from /usr/lib/libgazebo_transport.so.1
#2  0x00007ffff790838a in gazebo::transport::TopicManager::ProcessNodes(bool)
    () from /usr/lib/libgazebo_transport.so.1
#3  0x00007ffff78f3028 in gazebo::transport::ConnectionManager::RunUpdate() ()
   from /usr/lib/libgazebo_transport.so.1
#4  0x00007ffff78f3e4d in gazebo::transport::ConnectionManager::Run() ()
   from /usr/lib/libgazebo_transport.so.1
#5  0x00007ffff34efce9 in thread_proxy ()
   from /usr/lib/libboost_thread.so.1.46.1
#6  0x00007ffff54f6e9a in start_thread (arg=0x7fffdbfff700)
    at pthread_create.c:308
#7  0x00007ffff37efcbd in clone ()
    at ../sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/x86_64/clone.S:112
#8  0x0000000000000000 in ?? ()
~~~
content.html:
I've observer a couple crashes of gzclient while testing the multicamera_noisy_test.world. I open an Images viewer of the 6 cameras (~/multicamera_6/link/cam6/images) and move and rotate boxes. Occasionally gzclient crashes. I got the following backtrace, using the 1.7.0 deb version.

Program received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault.
[Switching to Thread 0x7fffdbfff700 (LWP 21145)]
0x00000000000000e1 in ?? ()
(gdb) bt
#0  0x00000000000000e1 in ?? ()
#1  0x00007ffff78fdd75 in gazebo::transport::Node::ProcessIncoming() ()
   from /usr/lib/libgazebo_transport.so.1
#2  0x00007ffff790838a in gazebo::transport::TopicManager::ProcessNodes(bool)
    () from /usr/lib/libgazebo_transport.so.1
#3  0x00007ffff78f3028 in gazebo::transport::ConnectionManager::RunUpdate() ()
   from /usr/lib/libgazebo_transport.so.1
#4  0x00007ffff78f3e4d in gazebo::transport::ConnectionManager::Run() ()
   from /usr/lib/libgazebo_transport.so.1
#5  0x00007ffff34efce9 in thread_proxy ()
   from /usr/lib/libboost_thread.so.1.46.1
#6  0x00007ffff54f6e9a in start_thread (arg=0x7fffdbfff700)
    at pthread_create.c:308
#7  0x00007ffff37efcbd in clone ()
    at ../sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/x86_64/clone.S:112
#8  0x0000000000000000 in ?? ()
